body:
Hello I have been on avicus for 7 months but I believe it was longer than that but I rejoined when Avicus was the name after MCZone was done, and now I'm back. I've been back for about 3 weeks now and I'm Happy to be back.

Well AMA and Hopefully I see you on the server!

Dont forget to just say Hi!
